/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the buildings that line the street. These structures are adorned with vibrant red and yellow banners, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the scene. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, providing a touch of nature amidst the cityscape. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static city environment.
